data.description: Get Hostnames of all the hosts that reported to have runt a specific executable known by its name
data.title: * W0002-which hosts saw this file ?

data.description:
[Executes an Orbital forensic snapshot and enables AMP host isolation]
[Supported observables: IP address, hostname, AMP GUID]

Workflow Description:
When triggered, this workflow will initiate an Orbital forensic snapshot for the endpoint identified by the provided observable. Then, it enables AMP host isolation.

Workflow Requirements:
This workflow requires the Orbital_Credentials and AMP_Credentials account keys be configured with Orbital and AMP API credentials. Please verify these settings prior to execution.
data.title: Take Forensic Snapshot and Isolate

data.description:
[Executes an Orbital forensic snapshot]
[Supported observables: IP address, hostname, AMP GUID]

Workflow Description:
When triggered, this workflow will initiate an Orbital forensic snapshot for the endpoint identified by the provided observable.

Workflow Requirements:
This workflow requires the Orbital_Credentials account key be configured with Orbital API credentials. Please verify these settings prior to execution.
data.title: Take Orbital Forensic Snapshot

data.description: This workflow check the Secure EndPoint every 5 mins. And if there are new events then an alert is send to a Webex Team Room with details of all new events
data.title: Get New Secure EndPoint Events-(W0049)-DEV
